phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com and perform Navigate to homepage
Navigate to https://www.target.com/c/order-pickup and perform Click on 'Pickup & delivery'

assertions.description: Verify that options for order pickup and delivery are presented

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com/c/order-pickup and perform Confirm or select any available pickup/delivery option (e.g., 'Ship to address' or 'Store Pickup')

assertions.description: Verify that selected fulfillment method is confirmed and active
Verify that product search or browsing reflects the chosen fulfillment option

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com/search and perform Use the search bar to search for a general product (e.g., 'household essentials')

assertions.description: Verify that search results display products available for the selected fulfillment method
Verify that product results include pricing information

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com/product-detail and perform Select any product from the results that appears available for the chosen fulfillment method

assertions.description: Verify that product details page loads, indicating availability for the chosen fulfillment method
Verify that add-to-cart option is present for the product

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com/product-detail and perform Add the selected item to the shopping cart

assertions.description: Verify that any product available for the chosen fulfillment can be added to cart
Verify that cart reflects the added item and its association with the chosen fulfillment method

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com and perform Navigate to homepage
Navigate to https://www.target.com/search and perform Use the search bar to search for a broad product category (e.g., 'electronics')

assertions.description: Verify that search returns relevant products with prices displayed
Verify that product list updates based on search query

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com/product-detail and perform Select the first available product from the search results

assertions.description: Verify that product details page displays product name, price, and add-to-cart option

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com/product-detail and perform Add the selected item to the shopping cart

assertions.description: Verify that any selected product can be added to cart
Verify that cart item count updates

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com/cart and perform Proceed to the checkout process from the cart

assertions.description: Verify that cart displays added items with quantities and total price
Verify that checkout initiation navigates to the first step of the checkout flow

test_files.name: Detailed Category Exploration and Filtering
test_files.title: Detailed Category Exploration and Filtering Test Journey

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com and perform Navigate to homepage
Navigate to https://www.target.com/c/categories and perform Click on 'Categories' to view all product categories

assertions.description: Verify that a list of major product categories is displayed

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com/c/home-goods and perform Select any major product category (e.g., 'Home Goods')

assertions.description: Verify that category page displays a list of products with pricing
Verify that products displayed are relevant to the selected category

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com/c/home-goods and perform Apply any available filter (e.g., 'price range', 'brand', or 'color') to the results

assertions.description: Verify that filter application updates the displayed product list and count
Verify that applied filters are visibly active

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com/product-detail and perform Select any product from the filtered results to view its details

assertions.description: Verify that product details page for the selected item loads with price and add-to-cart option

test_files.name: Information Seeking for Services
test_files.title: Information Seeking for Services Test Journey

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com and perform Navigate to homepage
Navigate to https://www.target.com/store-locator and perform Click on 'Find Stores'

assertions.description: Verify that store locator page loads with options to find nearby stores

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com and perform Navigate back to the homepage (using browser back or direct navigation)
Navigate to https://www.target.com/weekly-ad and perform Click on 'Weekly Ad' to view current advertisements

assertions.description: Verify that weekly Ad page displays current advertisements and promotions
Verify that ad content is accessible and readable

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com and perform Navigate to homepage
Navigate to https://www.target.com/c/deals and perform Click on 'Deals' to view current promotions

assertions.description: Verify that deals page displays current promotions and discounted items

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com/product-detail and perform Browse the deals and select any featured deal item

assertions.description: Verify that product details page shows the deal item with its discounted price and add-to-cart option

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com/product-detail and perform Add the selected deal item to the shopping cart

assertions.description: Verify that any deal item can be added to the shopping cart
Verify that cart item count updates

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.target.com/cart and perform View the shopping cart to review the item

assertions.description: Verify that cart displays the added deal item with its discounted price
Verify that cart total reflects the discounted price
